name: 4X4 OFF-ROAD CHALLENGE
description: Petrol heads and off-road driving enthusiasts get to experience off-road simulation with the 20 best 4x4 off-road vehicles ever developed in various terrains. It's not just about power and speed. You have to master balancing, control and maneuvering for you to succeed and finish the 4x4 off-road challenge. As you progress you will be able to unlock the best 4x4 vehicles and experience wildlife as you move across the lands. Experience different terrains and landscapes as you drive through the off-road routes and enjoy the beautiful scenery with animals in their natural habitats.
